description: Continued fraction expansion of constant defined in A054399.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,2000
prog: (PARI) contfrac(prodinf(n=1,((1-3/(2*(n+1)))^(1/2^n))))(PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 2300); x=contfrac(prodinf(n=1, ((1-3/(2*(n+1)))^(1/2^n)))); for (n=0, 2000, write("b062093.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 01 2009]
crossrefs: Cf. A054399 Decimal expansion. [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 01 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 28 2001
extensions: Terms corrected by removing a spurious comma and 2 terms added by _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 01 2009
